subject: AW: [junit] JUnit Constraints.
msgSnippet: Responding to Selena Su: Su asked: Once last question, is there any constraints on JUnit tools? There are only two constraints of JUnit, that I have
messageBody:
Responding to Selena Su:

Su asked: Once last question,
is there any constraints
on JUnit tools?

There are only two constraints of JUnit,
that I have experienced in the past two years:

1. The Java language.
2. The creativity of the developer.

The first one is a very unrestrictive
constraint.

And the second one depends on you.

Sincerely yours:

Dr. Oliver Strebel
